msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the right and the left. Kollesis at right and left. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Heron, his brother with the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Agathopous, slave of Taseus alias Isarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 148)
Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Gaius Julius Maximus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159)
Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Kommonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Leouas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184)
Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)

Achillas, his brother with the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)

Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 226)
Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Mysthes, son of Phaesis, grandson of Mysthes, mother Aunchis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Menches, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 187)
Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Ptolemaios, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 220)
Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 167)
Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thases (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 155)
Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 176)
Harpalos, maimed (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 155)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224;

div.ab: "(Column) 84:;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, his brother with the same mother, copper drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora, copper drachmas 4;;Agathopous, slave of Taseus alias Isarion, copper drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, copper drachmas 8;;Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, copper drachmas 4;;Gaius Julius Maximus;;(in left margin: drachmas 2 obols 22) geometria of year 12 drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Kommonis, copper drachmas 4;;Leouas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis, copper drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Papeis, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 8;;Chairemon, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme, drachmas 8;;Achillas, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, copper drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 88 obols 22.;(Epeiph) 27 likewise:;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, copper drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas (of priests) 4;;Mysthes, son of Phaesis, grandson of Mysthes, mother Aunchis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 8;;Menches, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, copper drachmas 4 obols 28;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 44 copper drachmas 4;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, copper drachmas 4;;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thases, copper drachma obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, copper drachmas 8;;Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios, copper drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 120 obols 27.;(Epeiph) 28 likewise:;Ptollous, daughter of Apion;;(drachmas 4 obols 20) Ptollous, daughter of Apion (Harpalos maimed);orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obols 2;;geometria of year 12 drachma 1 obol 2 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 3."
